message.raw: Feature Request [ 1526353 ] - Make 'last transform' a member of the trimesh geom, not trimesh data - to support instancing. New functions: dGeomTriMeshSetLastTransform and dGeomTriMeshGetLastTransform work very similar to before and require minimal user code changes.
